info.name: FHIR Server API
info.description:
Comprehensive Postman collection for the python-fhir-cql FHIR R4 server.

Supports all resource types, search parameters, and advanced operations.

item.name: Patch Patient
item.description: Apply JSON Patch operations to a Patient resource (RFC 6902)

item.name: Create Simple Patient Profile
item.description: Create a StructureDefinition profile that requires identifier and name

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "StructureDefinition",
  "id": "simple-patient",
  "url": "http://example.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/simple-patient",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "name": "SimplePatient",
  "title": "Simple Patient Profile",
  "status": "active",
  "date": "2024-01-15",
  "publisher": "Example Organization",
  "description": "A simple Patient profile that requires identifier and at least one name.",
  "fhirVersion": "4.0.1",
  "kind": "resource",
  "abstract": false,
  "type": "Patient",
  "baseDefinition": "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Patient",
  "derivation": "constraint",
  "snapshot": {
    "element": [
      {"id": "Patient", "path": "Patient", "min": 0, "max": "*"},
      {"id": "Patient.identifier", "path": "Patient.identifier", "min": 1, "max": "*"},
      {"id": "Patient.name", "path": "Patient.name", "min": 1, "max": "*"},
      {"id": "Patient.name.family", "path": "Patient.name.family", "min": 1, "max": "1"}
    ]
  }
}

item.name: Create Vital Signs Observation Profile
item.description: Create a StructureDefinition profile for vital signs observations

item.name: Read StructureDefinition
item.description: Read a StructureDefinition by ID

item.name: Search StructureDefinition by URL
item.description: Search for StructureDefinition by canonical URL

item.name: Search StructureDefinition by Type
item.description: Search for StructureDefinitions by constrained type (e.g., Patient profiles)

item.name: Search StructureDefinition by Kind
item.description: Search for resource-type StructureDefinitions

item.name: Search StructureDefinition by Status
item.description: Search for active StructureDefinitions

item.name: List All StructureDefinitions
item.description: List all StructureDefinition resources in the server

item.name: Delete StructureDefinition
item.description: Delete a StructureDefinition by ID

item.name: $subsumes (GET)
item.description: Test if 'diabetes' subsumes 'type1'

item.name: $subsumes (by ID)
item.description: Test subsumption on specific CodeSystem

item.name: memberOf
item.description: Check if code is member of ValueSet

item.name: Batch/Transaction
item.description: Batch processes entries independently. Transaction processes entries atomically with rollback on failure.

item.name: Batch Request
item.description: Batch operations process each entry independently - failures in one entry do not affect others

item.name: Transaction Request (Atomic)
item.description: Transaction operations process all entries atomically - if any entry fails, ALL changes are rolled back

item.name: Transaction with Create
item.description: Transaction with POST (create) operations - all resources created atomically

item.name: Patient $validate (Type-level)
item.description: Validate a Patient resource against FHIR R4 rules

item.name: Patient $validate (Instance-level)
item.description: Validate an existing Patient resource

item.name: Observation $validate (Missing Required)
item.description: Validate an Observation with missing required fields - shows validation errors

item.name: Observation $validate (Valid)
item.description: Validate a valid Observation resource

item.name: Condition $validate (Invalid Code)
item.description: Validate a Condition with invalid clinical status code

item.name: Patient $validate with Profile
item.description: Validate a Patient against a StructureDefinition profile

item.name: Patient $validate with Profile (Missing Identifier)
item.description: Validate a Patient against profile - shows error for missing required identifier

item.name: Observation $validate with Vital Signs Profile
item.description: Validate an Observation against the vital signs profile

item.name: $validate with Parameters
item.description: Validate using Parameters wrapper with embedded resource and profile

item.name: Patient $everything
item.description: Get all resources related to a patient

item.name: Measure $evaluate-measure (Population)
item.description: Evaluate a measure against all patients

item.name: Measure $evaluate-measure (Individual)
item.description: Evaluate a measure for a single patient

item.name: Measure $evaluate-measure (With Period)
item.description: Evaluate a measure with custom measurement period

item.name: Measure $evaluate-measure (Group Subject)
item.description: Evaluate a measure for all patients in a Group

item.name: Patient $diff (Version)
item.description: Compare current version with a previous version

item.name: Patient $diff (Two Resources)
item.description: Compare two Patient resources provided in body

item.name: ValueSet $expand
item.description: Expand a ValueSet to get all codes

item.name: CodeSystem $lookup
item.description: Look up a code in a CodeSystem

item.name: ValueSet $validate-code
item.description: Validate that a code is in a ValueSet

item.name: Chained Search - Conditions by Patient Name
item.description: Find Conditions where the referenced Patient has name containing 'Smith'

item.name: Chained Search - Observations by Patient
item.description: Find Observations for Patients with specific identifier

item.name: Chained Search - MedicationRequests by Practitioner
item.description: Find MedicationRequests written by practitioners named 'Johnson'

item.name: Reverse Chained (_has) - Patients with Diabetes
item.description: Find Patients who have a Condition with diabetes code

item.name: Reverse Chained (_has) - Patients with Specific Observation
item.description: Find Patients who have an Observation with LOINC code 8480-6 (Systolic BP)

item.name: Reverse Chained (_has) - Patients with Allergies
item.description: Find Patients who have an AllergyIntolerance record

item.name: Combined - Chained with Regular Params
item.description: Find active Conditions for Patients named Smith

item.name: Combined - _has with _revinclude
item.description: Find Patients with diabetes and include their Conditions

item.name: Create PHQ-9 Questionnaire
item.description: Create a PHQ-9 depression screening questionnaire

item.name: Create GAD-7 Questionnaire
item.description: Create a GAD-7 anxiety screening questionnaire

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "Questionnaire",
  "id": "gad-7",
  "url": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/gad-7",
  "name": "gad_7",
  "title": "Generalized Anxiety Disorder Assessment (GAD-7)",
  "status": "active",
  "subjectType": ["Patient"],
  "description": "A 7-item anxiety screening tool",
  "purpose": "Anxiety screening and severity assessment",
  "item": [
    {"linkId": "1", "text": "Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "2", "text": "Not being able to stop or control worrying", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "3", "text": "Worrying too much about different things", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "4", "text": "Trouble relaxing", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "5", "text": "Being so restless that it's hard to sit still", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "6", "text": "Becoming easily annoyed or irritable", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "7", "text": "Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueInteger": 0}, {"valueInteger": 1}, {"valueInteger": 2}, {"valueInteger": 3}]}
  ]
}

item.name: Create Pain Assessment Questionnaire
item.description: Create a pain assessment questionnaire

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "Questionnaire",
  "id": "pain-assessment",
  "url": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/pain-assessment",
  "name": "pain_assessment",
  "title": "Pain Assessment Questionnaire",
  "status": "active",
  "subjectType": ["Patient"],
  "description": "Comprehensive pain evaluation form",
  "item": [
    {"linkId": "pain-level", "text": "Rate your pain level (0-10)", "type": "integer"},
    {"linkId": "pain-location", "text": "Where is your pain located?", "type": "string"},
    {
      "linkId": "pain-type",
      "text": "Describe your pain",
      "type": "choice",
      "answerOption": [
        {"valueString": "sharp"},
        {"valueString": "dull"},
        {"valueString": "burning"},
        {"valueString": "aching"},
        {"valueString": "throbbing"}
      ]
    },
    {"linkId": "pain-interferes", "text": "Does pain interfere with daily activities?", "type": "boolean"}
  ]
}

item.name: Create Health Intake Questionnaire
item.description: Create a health intake form with groups and various item types

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "Questionnaire",
  "id": "health-intake",
  "url": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/health-intake",
  "name": "health_intake",
  "title": "Patient Health Intake Form",
  "status": "active",
  "subjectType": ["Patient"],
  "description": "General health intake questionnaire",
  "item": [
    {
      "linkId": "emergency-contact",
      "text": "Emergency Contact",
      "type": "group",
      "item": [
        {"linkId": "ec1", "text": "Contact Name", "type": "string"},
        {"linkId": "ec2", "text": "Relationship", "type": "choice", "answerOption": [{"valueString": "Spouse"}, {"valueString": "Parent"}, {"valueString": "Child"}, {"valueString": "Sibling"}, {"valueString": "Friend"}, {"valueString": "Other"}]},
        {"linkId": "ec3", "text": "Phone Number", "type": "string"}
      ]
    },
    {"linkId": "current-symptoms", "text": "What symptoms are you experiencing?", "type": "text"},
    {"linkId": "symptom-duration", "text": "How long have you had these symptoms?", "type": "string"},
    {"linkId": "medications", "text": "List current medications", "type": "text"},
    {"linkId": "allergies", "text": "Do you have any allergies?", "type": "boolean"},
    {"linkId": "smoking", "text": "Do you smoke?", "type": "boolean"}
  ]
}

{
  "resourceType": "Questionnaire",
  "id": "phq-9",
  "url": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/phq-9",
  "name": "phq_9",
  "title": "Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9) - Updated",
  "status": "active",
  "subjectType": ["Patient"],
  "description": "A 9-item depression screening tool (updated)"
}

item.name: Create PHQ-9 Response
item.description: Create a completed PHQ-9 depression screening response

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "QuestionnaireResponse",
  "questionnaire": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/phq-9",
  "status": "completed",
  "subject": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "encounter": {"reference": "Encounter/{{encounterId}}"},
  "authored": "2024-06-15T10:30:00Z",
  "author": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "item": [
    {"linkId": "1", "text": "Little interest or pleasure in doing things", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "2", "text": "Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 1}]},
    {"linkId": "3", "text": "Trouble falling or staying asleep", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "4", "text": "Feeling tired or having little energy", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 3}]},
    {"linkId": "5", "text": "Poor appetite or overeating", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 1}]},
    {"linkId": "6", "text": "Feeling bad about yourself", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 1}]},
    {"linkId": "7", "text": "Trouble concentrating on things", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "8", "text": "Moving or speaking slowly", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 0}]},
    {"linkId": "9", "text": "Thoughts of self-harm", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 0}]}
  ]
}

item.name: Create GAD-7 Response
item.description: Create a completed GAD-7 anxiety screening response (score: 12 = Moderate anxiety)

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "QuestionnaireResponse",
  "questionnaire": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/gad-7",
  "status": "completed",
  "subject": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "authored": "2024-06-15T11:00:00Z",
  "author": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "item": [
    {"linkId": "1", "text": "Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "2", "text": "Not being able to stop or control worrying", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "3", "text": "Worrying too much about different things", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "4", "text": "Trouble relaxing", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "5", "text": "Being so restless that it's hard to sit still", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 1}]},
    {"linkId": "6", "text": "Becoming easily annoyed or irritable", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 2}]},
    {"linkId": "7", "text": "Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 1}]}
  ]
}

item.name: Create Pain Assessment Response
item.description: Create a completed pain assessment response

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "QuestionnaireResponse",
  "questionnaire": "http://example.org/Questionnaire/pain-assessment",
  "status": "completed",
  "subject": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "authored": "2024-06-15T14:00:00Z",
  "author": {"reference": "Practitioner/{{practitionerId}}"},
  "source": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "item": [
    {"linkId": "pain-level", "text": "Rate your pain level (0-10)", "answer": [{"valueInteger": 7}]},
    {"linkId": "pain-location", "text": "Where is your pain located?", "answer": [{"valueString": "Lower back"}]},
    {"linkId": "pain-type", "text": "Describe your pain", "answer": [{"valueString": "aching"}]},
    {"linkId": "pain-interferes", "text": "Does pain interfere with daily activities?", "answer": [{"valueBoolean": true}]}
  ]
}

item.name: Create Health Intake Response
item.description: Create a completed health intake form response with grouped items

item.name: Create In-Progress Response
item.description: Create a partially completed questionnaire response

item.description: Get responses with the referenced questionnaire included

item.description: Update an in-progress response to completed status

item.name: Conditional Create (If-None-Exist)
item.description: Create Patient only if no match exists for the identifier

item.name: Conditional Update (by identifier)
item.description: Update Patient by search criteria instead of ID

item.name: Conditional Delete (by identifier)
item.description: Delete all Patients matching the search criteria

item.name: Conditional Delete (Observations by status)
item.description: Delete all cancelled Observations

item.description: Export all resources from the server

item.description: Export specific resource types

item.description: Export all Patient data and related clinical resources

item.name: Group $export
item.description: Export data for all patients in a Group

item.name: Check Export Status
item.description: Check the status of a bulk export job

item.name: Download Export Output
item.description: Download NDJSON output file for a resource type

item.name: Delete Export Job
item.description: Cancel/delete a bulk export job

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "ClinicalImpression",
  "status": "completed",
  "subject": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "effectiveDateTime": "2024-01-15T14:00:00Z",
  "summary": "Patient presenting with chest pain. Cardiac workup negative. Likely musculoskeletal etiology."
}

item.name: GraphQL
item.description: GraphQL API for FHIR resources following the FHIR GraphQL specification

item.name: GraphiQL Playground
item.description: Open the interactive GraphQL IDE in browser

item.name: Query - Patient by ID
item.description: Fetch a single Patient resource by ID

item.name: Query - Patient List
item.description: Search for patients with filters

item.name: Query - Patient Connection (Pagination)
item.description: Cursor-based pagination for patients

item.name: Query - Generic Resource
item.description: Query any resource type dynamically

item.name: Query - Multiple Resources
item.description: Fetch patient with related observations and conditions

item.name: Mutation - Create Patient
item.description: Create a new Patient via GraphQL mutation

item.name: Mutation - Update Patient
item.description: Update an existing Patient via GraphQL mutation

item.name: Mutation - Delete Patient
item.description: Delete a Patient via GraphQL mutation

item.name: Mutation - Generic Create
item.description: Create any resource type via generic mutation

item.name: Schema Introspection
item.description: Get the GraphQL schema via introspection

body.raw:
{
  "resourceType": "ResearchStudy",
  "identifier": [{"system": "http://clinicaltrials.gov", "value": "NCT12345678"}],
  "title": "Efficacy of Novel Diabetes Treatment",
  "status": "active",
  "phase": {"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/research-study-phase", "code": "phase-3", "display": "Phase 3"}]},
  "condition": [{"coding": [{"system": "http://snomed.info/sct", "code": "44054006", "display": "Type 2 diabetes mellitus"}]}]
}

{
  "resourceType": "Location",
  "id": "location-001",
  "status": "active",
  "name": "Main Hospital Building A",
  "description": "Primary care facility - Building A, 3rd floor",
  "mode": "instance",
  "type": [{"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode", "code": "HOSP", "display": "Hospital"}]}],
  "telecom": [{"system": "phone", "value": "555-123-4567", "use": "work"}],
  "address": {"use": "work", "line": ["123 Healthcare Ave"], "city": "Springfield", "state": "IL", "postalCode": "62701"},
  "physicalType": {"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/location-physical-type", "code": "bu", "display": "Building"}]},
  "managingOrganization": {"reference": "Organization/{{organizationId}}"}
}

{
  "resourceType": "Coverage",
  "id": "coverage-001",
  "status": "active",
  "type": {"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode", "code": "HIP", "display": "health insurance plan policy"}]},
  "subscriber": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "beneficiary": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "relationship": {"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/subscriber-relationship", "code": "self", "display": "Self"}]},
  "period": {"start": "2024-01-01", "end": "2024-12-31"},
  "payor": [{"display": "Blue Cross Blue Shield"}],
  "class": [{
    "type": {"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/coverage-class", "code": "plan", "display": "Plan"}]},
    "value": "PPO-500",
    "name": "PPO Plan with $500 deductible"
  }]
}

{
  "resourceType": "Device",
  "id": "device-001",
  "status": "active",
  "deviceName": [{"name": "Acme Blood Pressure Monitor", "type": "manufacturer-name"}],
  "type": {"coding": [{"system": "http://snomed.info/sct", "code": "43770009", "display": "Blood pressure monitor"}]},
  "manufacturer": "Acme Medical Devices",
  "modelNumber": "BPM-2000",
  "serialNumber": "SN12345678",
  "patient": {"reference": "Patient/{{patientId}}"},
  "owner": {"reference": "Organization/{{organizationId}}"}
}

{
  "resourceType": "Library",
  "id": "library-001",
  "url": "http://example.org/Library/diabetes-care",
  "name": "DiabetesCareLibrary",
  "title": "Diabetes Care CQL Library",
  "status": "active",
  "type": {"coding": [{"system": "http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/library-type", "code": "logic-library", "display": "Logic Library"}]},
  "date": "2024-06-15",
  "description": "CQL library for diabetes care quality measures",
  "content": [{
    "contentType": "text/cql",
    "data": "bGlicmFyeSBEaWFiZXRlc0NhcmUgdmVyc2lvbiAnMS4wLjAnCgpkZWZpbmUgIkRpYWJldGljIFBhdGllbnRzIjoKICBbQ29uZGl0aW9uOiBjb2RlIGluICJEaWFiZXRlcyBDb2RlcyJd"
  }]
}
